heading: Underroot Dungeon Guide
content: Underroot is a fast dungeon with easy monsters and the . This aspect is valuable for nearly every class for a quick-and-easy damage multiplier that you can apply to your gear early on. It's part of a bigger Stronghold, but Druids will need to make their way here anyway, and the waypoint is in a highly valuable location for quick travel, so you may want to pick this one up. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! This dungeon is not accessible until you cleanse out the evil in . This unlocks the Dungeon along with vendors and a waypoint. This can be done solo, but goes by quicker with a group of friends. Reviewed by
